text: Georges Mothron (born April 5, 1948 in Argenteuil) is a former member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the Val-d'Oise department, and is a member of the Republicans. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:People from Argenteuil Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:The Popular Right Category:Mayors of places in Île-de-France Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Georges Mothron
